entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:33 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 7:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
